faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Model Guru
faq.pageDescription: Explore our comprehensive FAQ section to find answers to the most common questions about our platform, services, and features.

whatIsModelGuru.question: What is Model Guru?
whatIsModelGuru.answer: Model Guru is a comprehensive platform for discovering, comparing, and implementing AI models. We provide detailed information about various AI models, their capabilities, and how to use them effectively.

whoIsItFor.question: Who is Model Guru for?
whoIsItFor.answer: Model Guru is designed for AI enthusiasts, developers, researchers, and businesses looking to leverage AI models. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, our platform provides valuable insights and resources.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: You can create an account by clicking the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner. You'll need to provide your email address and create a password.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions sent to your email.

findModels.question: How do I find specific AI models?
findModels.answer: You can use our search function, browse by categories, or use filters to find specific models. Each model has detailed information about its capabilities and use cases.

compareModels.question: Can I compare different AI models?
compareModels.answer: Yes, you can compare up to 3 models at a time using our comparison tool. This helps you make informed decisions about which model best suits your needs.

platformInfo.question: What information is available about AI platforms?
platformInfo.answer: We provide comprehensive information about various AI platforms, including pricing, features, supported models, and user reviews.

platformComparison.question: How can I compare different AI platforms?
platformComparison.answer: Use our platform comparison tool to evaluate different platforms based on features, pricing, and user ratings.

accessReports.question: How do I access analysis reports?
accessReports.answer: Analysis reports are available to registered users. You can access them through the Reports section of your dashboard.

reportUpdates.question: How often are reports updated?
reportUpdates.answer: Reports are updated monthly to reflect the latest developments in the AI model landscape.

browserSupport.question: Which browsers are supported?
browserSupport.answer: Model Guru supports all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version for the best experience.

mobileAccess.question: Can I access Model Guru on mobile devices?
mobileAccess.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works on all mobile devices. We also offer a mobile app for iOS and Android.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team for assistance.
